item.title: Adapting _saccades_ for the Allosphere
item.description: In spring of 2024 I was asked to present saccades in the Allosphere: at 360 degree video sphere with 60 channel surround sound at UC Santa Barbara. My saxophone playing collaborator Kyle Hutchins was doing a west coast tour and was invited to play there. He though it would be cool to bring saccades to this very tech-forward space and I thought it would be a fun challenge I wanted to make sure to take advantage of what they have.
